net.derquinse.bocas

Class ForwardingBocas

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject
      • net.derquinse.bocas.ForwardingBocas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bocas
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ZipBocas

    @Beta
public abstract class ForwardingBocas
extends ForwardingObject
implements Bocas
    A bocas bucket that forwards all its method calls to another.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez.

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: Bocas
        Closes the bucket so it cannot be used again. Optional operation, buckets that do not need to be closed ignore this operation. Any operation other than close should throw IllegalStateException. Calling close in a closed bucket is a no-op.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Bocas

      • putAll

        public List<ByteString> putAll(Iterable<? extends ByteSource> values)
        Description copied from interface: Bocas
        Puts some values into the repository in a single operation. The operation must be atomic.
        Specified by:
        putAll in interface Bocas
        Returns:
        The list of generated keys, in the same order than the objects provided.
